name: Apocars
description:
A destruction derby game inspired by Carmageddon and Mad Max for the Apocalypse Jam 2022

Goal
Reach 10 checkpoints before everyone else, and try not to total your car in the process! There's only one level.

Controls
WASD/ZQSD: Movement controls for car
R: Restart
M: Mute music

Additional info
Which car you drive doesn't affect speed or damage, it's purely visual. Your car and its skin is chosen at random.

Known issues
There's a bug where sometimes checkpoints will spawn in a way that two bots constantly trigger it, resulting in an instant loss.

Credits
- Models, coding and music by me
- Sound effects from Universal Sound FX
- World textures from SketchUp Texture Club
- Arcade Car Controller from some YouTube tutorial video I genuinely couldn't find

Cars

Finally there's an actual reason to be afraid of the dentist. His car is an absolute monstrosity, and so are his manners.

The Butcher uses his trusty Formula Student vehicle to cut up some meat with that blade at the front. Makes one wonder what kind of meat is in that meat grinder..
